name: Feature 072: Empty state shows 'No windows open' message
description: When entering workspace mode with NO windows open anywhere, preview card should show empty state message.

actions.description: Kill all windows (regex pattern to match any app_id)
Wait for all window kills to complete

notes: This test validates empty state handling in User Story 1
After killing all windows, manually trigger workspace mode with CapsLock/Ctrl+0
Preview card should show: 'No windows open' message (empty=true in AllWindowsPreview model)
This validates graceful handling when workstation has no open applications
Empty state should render within <150ms (same performance target as non-empty state)
